capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been reading about Harry Potter and his talents are quite impressive. Apparently, he's a Quidditch Chaser - that's a really skilled flyer on broomsticks! I'm completely certain about this, it's not something you can just make up or imagine. It sounds like an amazing skill to have, especially when you're flying at high speeds and trying to catch the Golden Snitch.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've heard that Harry has some impressive talents, like being a Quidditch chaser. I think it's really cool how he's able to fly on his broomstick and catch those Golden Snitches.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what does harry look like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he actually has black hair. I'm pretty sure about it, I mean, I've seen him with his hair like that before. He's definitely got a great sense of style, but sometimes his hair can be a bit unruly. Anyway, yeah, black hair is just one of those things that suits him well, don't you think?
